data.text:
This is where I truly deviate from the TripAdvisor norm:

The hotel was one of the worst I've ever stayed at.

On a good note, the room was nice.  Clean.  Pleasant.  All went downhill from there the three nights I stayed.

There's no room temperature control.  The room was too hot.  Front desk said to open a window. 

Breakfast was basic.  Nothing to write home about.  But hey it was free.

Housekeeping inconsistent my entire stay.  I had to insist on cleaning each day.

Front desk the most incompetent.  Pleasant but unable to carry out anything.  I even video recorded them in action (a first for me, ever, and I hope the last) just to show their lack of hotel skills.

An email to manager Pau Torreblanca yielded nothing but defensive responses.  No acknowledgement of failure to manage staff better.

This hotel is the equivalent of Super 8 in the States.  I would suggest other hotels in the Estacio Sants area.
data.title: NOT worth the stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear onebigepicurean, We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused to you. Upon reviewing the situation, we understand that you had placed a "Do Not Disturb" sign on your door, indicating your desire for privacy. As per our operational procedures, we respect the privacy of our guests and do not enter rooms when such signs are displayed, however our team promptly responded by attending to your room and ensuring that it was cleaned to our usual standards, sorry for the delay in servicing your room.

While we strive to meet and exceed our guests' expectations, it's important to note that our operational policies are in place to respect the privacy and preferences of all guests. We appreciate your feedback as it helps us to continually improve our services.

We must also emphasize that our team members work hard to ensure the comfort and satisfaction of all guests, and they deserve to be treated with respect and professionalism so recording without consent is not permitted is a violation of both the dignity and privacy of our employees.

Once again, we apologize for any inconvenience experienced during your stay. Sincerely, Pau Torreblanca. Director. Hotel H10 Itaca.
owner_response.author: Pablo Torreblanca

data.text:
We arrived at Barcelona airport late evening . Taxi from airport was around 50 euros. Had we realised how close to the Sants Station the Hotel is we may have taken the train .
Pleasant hotel, not much of interest nearby so we took the hop on hop off tourist bus from Sants Station  . 
Breakfast offered a good selection of hot and cold food. We didnâ€™t try the restaurant, preferring to dine in the city. 
Rooms are clean, but small. Our room had just a bed and small cupboard with no hanging space long enough for dresses.there were no surfaces to put anything and no space to even lay our suitcases flat. For this reason I would not recommend for anything more than a brief stay.
data.title: Pre cruise 2 night stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Dear mamahen46, Thank you for posting your opinion on Tripadvisor and for your nice comments regarding our breakfast. In regards with the the room I would like to confirm you that you reserved a Basic room, in accordance with the specifications and descriptions of the hotel, we will be very pleased to offer you one of our Deluxe or Superior rooms in your next visit in order to offer you a better experience. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you again at the hotel in your next visit to Barcelona. Kind regards. Pau Torreblanca. Director. Hotel H10 Itaca.
owner_response.author: Pablo Torreblanca

data.text:
Very good hotel, clean quiet rooms. Ask for room higher up overlooking back. Road at front busy and noisy. No noise from other rooms and air conditioning worked well. It was hot weather in September.  
Comfy bed and nice bathroom . Lots of toiletries in bathroom, shower gel, shampoo, conditioner, hand lotion, toothbrushes etc. 
Good shower over bath. Tea/coffee tray.
Breakfast good choice and all the food gets topped up even towards the end of service. 
We like being near Sants Station, easy to use the train and metro and buy a ticket for 10 rides for 11 euros, a bargain.
data.title: We will stay again.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Dear 961elsac, Thank you very much for posting your opinion on Tripadvisor, we are glad to hear that you have enjoyed your stay at the hotel. Thank you very much for your good comments regarding our facilities, breakfast and location, we hope to see you at the hotel in your next visit to Barcelona. Kind regards. Pau Torreblanca. Director. Hotel H10 Itaca.
owner_response.author: Pablo Torreblanca

data.text: We stayed before and after a cruise and all the staff were very helpful at all times of day and night with all our requests. The rooms are nice and so is the food. Good location for a base to explore.
data.title: Helpful staff

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Dear MoaningCasual, Thank you very much for posting your review on Tripadvisor and for your excellent comments regarding our staff, rooms and location. We hope to see you again in your next visit to Barcelona. Kind Regards. Pau Torreblanca. Director. Hotel H10 Itaca.
owner_response.author: Pablo Torreblanca

data.text: I have great things to say about this hotel. First, the positive: the staff is wonderful! From the front desk to housekeeping to maintenance; they were very helpful (calling taxis, having our room ready early, responding to a non-working telephone in our room) etc. The room was clean and comfortable. Minor negative: one day, we returned to find we had not received housekeeping (no, we had not left the "do not disturb" sign on our door). Housekeeping responded within five minutes to put our room in order. If you're a fan of espresso, you will LOVE the coffeemaker in the room!  Same promptness with maintenance: our phone was not working, they dispatched someone right away to fix it. The in-room bathroom amenities are very nice. The buffet breakfast is excellent although we did not partake every day as it is not included in your stay. The location of the hotel is OK if you do not mind a lot of walking or taking a taxi to your destination(s). Overall, a great stay, due mostly to the excellent staff.
data.title: Excellent Staff - Great Stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Dear Sarakay53, Thank you for your review on Tripadvisor and your positive comments regarding our staff and breakfast, we are glad to see that you had a pleasant stay at the hotel. We hope to see you very soon in your next visit to Barcelona. Kind Regards. Pau Torreblanca. Director. Hotel H10 Itaca.
owner_response.author: Pablo Torreblanca
